wordpressPage.content:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”At Sherman Wealth Management, we put the power of Dimensional Fund Advisors’ (“Dimensional”) Nobel Prize-winning science behind our portfolios.” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:34px|text_align:left|color:%23444444|line_height:35px” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1543321196850{margin-bottom: 44px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”ABOUT THE FIRM” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23444444|line_height:26px” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

  • Dimensional is a global investment firm that has been serving investors for more than 30 years. They offer investment solutions across asset classes, including global equities, fixed income, and REITs. Dimensional manages $388 billion for investors worldwide.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”A DIFFERENT APPROACH TO INVESTING” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23444444|line_height:26px” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

  • Dimensional has a strong belief in markets that frees us to think differently about investing. They believe the best way to invest is to identify differences in expected returns and balance the tradeoffs among competing premiums, diversification, and costs. That philosophy has consistently guided the investment solutions we have offered clients from the beginning in 2015 when I became an RIA.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”A DYNAMIC INVESTMENT PROCESS” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23444444|line_height:26px” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

  • Dimensional’s goal is to add value over benchmarks through an integrated and robust process. Using information in market prices throughout the process, Dimensional carefully structures and implements portfolios to target higher expected returns. Their integrated, flexible approach considers the interactions among premiums, market frictions, costs, and diversification.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”A CLEAR VIEW OF EXPECTED RETURNS” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23444444|line_height:26px” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

  • Decades of research and rigorous testing underpin Dimensional’s approach to pursuing higher expected returns. Their solutions are sensible, backed by data, and cost-effective to capture in diversified portfolios.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BRINGING RESEARCH TO PRACTICE” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23444444|line_height:26px” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

  • Dimensional identifies compelling research and applies it to practical investment solutions. Dimensional works closely with leading financial academics, research scientists, and experts to identify new ideas, research, and findings that may benefit investors.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”OUR TRACK RECORD” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:left|color:%23444444|line_height:26px” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text]

  • Dimensional has a long history managing time-tested investment strategies for clients. By selectively utilizing Dimensional’s advances in financial science, we have been able to historically deliver results for our investors. Sherman Wealth Management, LLC and Dimensional Fund Advisors are not affiliated. For additional information regarding Dimensional, please visit their website by clicking here.
